name: Balancing Act (4096x1270)
description: Life puts us into so many whirlpools. Through constant pursuit of harmony we learns that we need to spend some time at the fringes and extremes — at the polar ends of existence — to understand what true balance means. Life around a 'KettuMaram' or catamaran for fishermen of Kerala is one such acts which they imbibed in their life for generations. Such acts of balancing makes their both ends meet.
